text: Uniharuko paigambarale tiniharusita pheri bhane ki usako rajasattako vahya cinha yo ho ki timro che'uma tyo bakasa a'une cha, jasala'i (svargaduta) pharistaharule ucaleka hunechan. Tyasama timro palanaharabata timila'i santusti pradana garne kuro hunecha, ra kehi an'ya kuraharu pani hunchan juna ki musa ra harunale chadera ga'eka thi'e. Yadi timi asthavana chau bhane yo timro lagi e'uta pratyaksa pramana ho
